steps.nodeStepDescription: Jump and then press  again while in the air to activate Lift.
An explosive grenade that causes bonus damage when attached to its target.
Burn away your target's defenses. While burning, targets are weakened to both you and your allies.
Burn your enemies with a heavy Solar Melee strike.
Sunstrike releases a Solar explosion on hit. Kills create a Sunspot that damages enemies inside.
Upgrades Lift for better directional control while in the air.
Upgrades Lift to carry you higher.
A grenade that sends forward a burning line of fire.
A grenade whose explosion catches enemies on fire, causing additional damage over time.
Summon a flaming hammer and wreak destruction down upon your enemies.
Upgrades Lift to provide a strong initial burst of momentum.
Press  during Hammer of Sol to hurl yourself forward. Enemies in your path explode, chaining fiery damage to other enemies.
Ignite the world, creating Sunspots everywhere your Hammer of Sol impacts.
Throw more hammers, and hammers cause bigger explosions.
Reduces Sunstrike cooldown. Getting a killing blow with Sunstrike instantly recharges it.
Training focused on battle recovery and speed.
Training focused on battle recovery and toughness.
Training focused on speed and toughness.
Enemies felled by your fire grant you bonus agility and reload speed. Stacks up to 3 times.
Your Hammer of Sol will alter its flight path to seek out your enemies.
Enemies felled by your hammer explode, chaining fiery Solar damage to others.
Training focused on maximum recovery.
Training focused on raw speed.
Training focused on all attributes.
Enemies brought down by your fire regenerate your health.
When Super energy is full, grenade and melee abilities recharge twice as fast.
While standing in a Sunspot you gain an Overshield and Hammer of Sol lasts longer.
Burn your enemies with a heavy Solar Melee strike.
